reviewText:
If your a tad tired of the current offerings from Hollywood mostly things blowing up and cars climbing bridges and one machine gun after another going off, you may find a trip back in time delightfully calming as you sit back and actually watch some good stories from the old days.
Not many special effects if any, the power of the story as told through the talent of the actors combined with some great musical scores.

Even if you're a young person, there are lessons to be learned by watching these vintage flicks of yesterday.
Great thing is you can watch them on your time in your home.
